meanings.sent1: Be careful with the delicate vase; it can break easily.
meanings.sent2: She handled the delicate glass ornament with care.
meanings.sent3: The delicate flower petal wilted at the slightest touch.
meanings.sent4: His delicate ego shattered like fragile glass under criticism.
meanings.sent5: The delicate butterfly's wings were as fragile as paper.

meanings.sent1: The delicate lace on her dress was beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a delicate dessert with intricate details.
meanings.sent3: The delicate jewelry sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her delicate handwriting was elegant and precise.
meanings.sent5: The delicate snowflake landed softly on the ground.

meanings.sent1: His delicate approach to the situation showed empathy.
meanings.sent2: She handled the delicate conversation with care.
meanings.sent3: The delicate dance of emotions played out in the room.
meanings.sent4: The delicate balance between work and life is important.
meanings.sent5: The delicate flavors of the dish blended perfectly together.

meanings.definition: Marked by fineness of structure or workmanship
meanings.sent1: The delicate embroidery on the pillow was intricate.
meanings.sent2: The artist's delicate brush strokes created a masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The delicate design of the building impressed everyone.
meanings.sent4: The delicate details of the sculpture were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The delicate craftsmanship of the watch was evident in its beauty.
